Thanks for all of the uploads!! You are a great guy _SnakEye! You are our FSX Pirate Bay hero!!

I compiled a list of the most popular request here:

Again bro, thanks for being awesome! :)
Thanks a lot man. Can we by any chance get the Coolsky DC-9?

Guys do check out my torrent and seed...
I'm sure you'll like it

Hey _SnakEye First of all thanks for all the amazing downloads, they are much appreciated by The Pirate Bay FSX community.

I have a quick question about one of your older torrents the [FSX] REX Game Studios - REX Essential+ Overdrive ( http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7794294/[FSX]_REX_Game_Studios_-_REX_Essential__Overdrive ) is it possible to do a clean install if you have no previous versions with this download?

Once again thanks and keep up the wonderful torrents!!!
Thanks for the mission pack, works fantastic.

@PikeyBoo, the torrent you referenced is the Full program, you can either run it as an Upgrade path (not really a path, but it will just overwrite your older version) or just from scratch.
I personally ran it from scratch, i.e. I did not have REX previously Installed on my machine.
